definitions.definition: Any of about 100-170 species of yellow, orange or red (rarely green) parasitic plants of the genus Cuscuta . Formerly treated as the only genus in the family Cuscutaceae , it is now placed in the morning glory family, Convolvulaceae .

main_definition: Any of about 100-170 species of yellow, orange or red (rarely green) parasitic plants of the genus Cuscuta . Formerly treated as the only genus in the family Cuscutaceae , it is now placed in the morning glory family, Convolvulaceae .
